title: Whereas by a clause contained in the act, intituled, an Act for the Explaining of Some Doubts Arising upon an Act, intituled, an Act for the Better Execution of His Majesties Gracious Declaration for the Settlement of his Kingdome of Ireland ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Essex.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,
